attributes.action: TO order a Public inquiry, into why NHS Prescription Drug Charges £6.85 are more expensive than private perscriptions for the same medication.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Being an asthma sufferer it is cheaper for me to ask my GP to provide me with a private perscription for my medication, than it is for him to give me an NHS perscription. My steriod with an NHS perscription is currently £6.85, a private perscription for the same medication is only £3.50
